title: Total Quantity by Stockcode
description: Displays the total quantity for each unique stockcode to understand the popularity of different items.
request_sql: SELECT stockcode, SUM(quantity) FROM data GROUP BY stockcode ORDER BY SUM(quantity) DESC

title: Unit Price Trend over Time
description: Shows the trend of unit prices over time to identify any price fluctuations or seasonality.
request_sql: SELECT invoicedate, AVG(unitprice) FROM data GROUP BY DATE(invoicedate) ORDER BY DATE(invoicedate)

title: Quantity vs. Unit Price Distribution
description: Analyzes the relationship between quantity and unit price to identify any correlations or trends.

title: Quantity by Country
description: Displays the total quantity for each unique country to understand sales distribution across countries.
request_sql: SELECT country, SUM(quantity) FROM data GROUP BY country ORDER BY SUM(quantity) DESC

title: Quantity Distribution by Month
description: Shows the distribution of quantity sold each month to identify any seasonality or trends.
request_sql: SELECT EXTRACT(MONTH FROM invoicedate) AS month, SUM(quantity) FROM data GROUP BY month ORDER BY month

title: Top 10 Customers by Quantity
description: Identifies the top 10 customers who purchased the most items.
request_sql: SELECT customerid, SUM(quantity) FROM data GROUP BY customerid ORDER BY SUM(quantity) DESC LIMIT 10

title: Quantity vs. Invoice Date Boxplot
description: Shows the distribution of quantity sold and its variability over time.
request_sql: SELECT invoicedate, MEDIAN(quantity) AS median_quantity, QUARTILE(quantity, 0.25) AS q1, QUARTILE(quantity, 0.75) AS q3 FROM data

title: Unit Price vs. Quantity Scatter and Line Chart
description: Explores the relationship between unit price and quantity to identify any trends or anomalies.

title: Top Stockcodes by Quantity Trend over Time
description: Displays the trend of top selling stockcodes and total quantity over time to identify any changes or trends.
request_sql: SELECT stockcode, SUM(quantity) FROM (SELECT stockcode, SUM(quantity) FROM data GROUP BY stockcode ORDER BY SUM(quantity) DESC LIMIT 10) x GROUP BY DATE(invoicedate) ORDER BY DATE(invoicedate)

title: Distribution of Quantity by Invoice Date
description: Shows the distribution of quantity sold on each invoice date.
request_sql: SELECT invoicedate, COUNT(*) AS total_invoices, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM data GROUP BY invoicedate
